item.description:
Identical twin sisters Lisa Hanson and Heather Kempskie will present a one-hour interactive seminar, focusing on the joys and challenges of raising siblings. Lisa and Heather lead successful careers in child-related professions and are co-authors of "The Siblings Busy Book: 200 Fun Activities for Kids of Different Ages." Constant companions â€“ these women prove that sibling fun never ends!

Hot topics for this discussion include:
- The importance of the sibling relationship
- Fun and simple ways parents can entertain and engage their children of various ages
- The reality of sibling rivalry and the role parents play.
item.name: Sibling Rivalry
